channel.title: Pi help
channel.description: ok in my server i got a td and corp beast but when i try to att them it wont let me? what is the problem and how to i fix??

item.title: Pi help
item.dc:creator: @II_Jacob_II II Jacob II
item.description:
@II_Jacob_II wrote:

As I’m new with PI and still learning, all I know is that it’s in
Data > CFG > Drops.tsm
or
Src > Server > Config.java

Depending on where yours is, I may or may not be able to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi help
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

Also how do i make it have drops?? like i know the code for the items but how do i do ammount and how often?

Read full topic

item.title: Pi help
item.dc:creator: @II_Jacob_II II Jacob II
item.description:
@II_Jacob_II wrote:

Yes I also have this problem, well I can only fix the Tormented Demons, go into
Data > CFG > Npc.cfg
And search for Tormented Demons and you should see this:

Or something simalar, the number at the end, in this case the 0 represents the health the NPC has, change it to what ever you like and you should be able to attack them now. Unfortunatly this is not thee same when it comes to the Corp’ Beast. I’m still looking for an answer, so if anyone could help, I’d be delited. ;D

Read full topic
